options.name: Action : Valut
options.description: Jump + Attack w/ Polearm. Move at least 3 units, +1 bonus dice.

options.name: Monster Tamer
options.description: Gain +1 skill with wildcraft. Your taming skill also works on monsters.

options.name: Heavy Weaponry
options.description: Gain +1 skill with complex melee weapons.
Gain +1 skill with deflection. Gain a bonus dice on defense checks against huge and larger creatures.
